blink.desc: Active: Blink Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
blink.notes:
Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
blink.lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

blades_of_attack.lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

broadsword.lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

chainmail.lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

claymore.lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

helm_of_iron_will.lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

javelin.desc: Passive: PierceGrants each attack a 25% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 100 bonus damage.
javelin.lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

mithril_hammer.lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

platemail.lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

quarterstaff.lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

quelling_blade.desc:
Active: Chop Tree/Ward Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targeting wards.Tree Range: 350Ward Range: 450
Passive: Quell Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 24 for melee heroes, and 7 for ranged.
quelling_blade.notes:
Cannot carry more than one.
Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Remote Mines.
quelling_blade.lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

faerie_fire.lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

infused_raindrop.desc: Passive: Magical Damage Block Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 50 damage. Comes with 5 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.
infused_raindrop.notes: Uses at most one charge per damage instance.

wind_lace.desc: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.
wind_lace.lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels

ring_of_protection.lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

stout_shield.desc: Passive: Damage BlockGives a 50% chance to block 18 damage on melee heroes, and 9 damage on ranged.
stout_shield.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
stout_shield.lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

moon_shard.desc:
Use: Consume Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 150 bonus night vision. Max 1 use.
Passive: Shade SightGrants 300 bonus night vision.
moon_shard.notes: The bonus night vision works during Night Stalker's Darkness ability.
moon_shard.lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

gauntlets.lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

slippers.lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

mantle.lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

branches.desc: Use: Plant Tree Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.Range: 200
branches.lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

belt_of_strength.lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

boots_of_elves.lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

robe.lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

circlet.lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

ogre_axe.lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

blade_of_alacrity.lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

staff_of_wizardry.lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

ultimate_orb.lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

gloves.lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

lifesteal.desc: Passive: LifestealHeals the attacker for 15% of attack damage dealt.
lifesteal.lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

ring_of_regen.lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

sobi_mask.lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

boots.desc: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

gem.desc:
Passive: True Sight Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 900 range of its carrier. 
Passive: EverlastingDropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
gem.lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

cloak.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
cloak.lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

talisman_of_evasion.notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
talisman_of_evasion.lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

cheese.desc: Use: Fondue Instantly restores 2500 health and 1500 mana.
cheese.lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

magic_stick.desc: Active: Energy Charge Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.
magic_stick.notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
magic_stick.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

magic_wand.desc: Active: Energy ChargeInstantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. Max 17 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.
magic_wand.notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
magic_wand.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

ghost.desc: Active: Ghost Form You enter ghost form for 4 seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.
ghost.notes:
Ends if you become Spell Immune, and will have no effect if you are already Spell Immune.
Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
ghost.lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

clarity.desc: Use: Replenish Grants 3.2 mana regeneration to the target for 50 seconds.If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.Range: 250
clarity.lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

enchanted_mango.desc: Use: Eat Mango Instantly restore 150 mana.Range: 400
enchanted_mango.notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.
enchanted_mango.lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

flask.desc: Use: Salve Grants 50 health regeneration to the target for 8 seconds.If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.Range: 250
flask.lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

dust.desc: Use: RevealReveals and slows invisible Heroes by -20 in a 1050 radius around the caster for 12 seconds.
dust.notes: Places a buff on enemy units in the area that prevents them from becoming invisible.
dust.lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.

bottle.desc: Active: RegenerateConsumes a charge to restore 80 health and 40 mana over 2.5 seconds.Range: 350Healing stops if attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan.  Bottle can be refilled at your team's fountain. Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use, and are activated automatically after 2 minutes.
bottle.notes:
Bottle is shareable. Stored runes cannot be shared. Hold Control to use Regenerate on an allied hero.
Bounty runes replenish 2/3 charges.
If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier will move 30% slower.
bottle.lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

ward_observer.desc: Use: PlantPlants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a 1600 radius to your team. Lasts 6 minutes.Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.Range: 500
ward_observer.lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

ward_sentry.desc: Use: Plant Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a 850 radius.Duration: 4 minutes.Does not grant ground vision.Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.Range: 500
ward_sentry.lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

ward_dispenser.desc: Use: Plant Plant the currently active ward.  Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.Range: 500
ward_dispenser.lore: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.

tango.desc: Use: Devour Consume a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming a ward or Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.Comes with 5 charges.  Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.Range: 165Ward Range: 450
tango.lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

tango_single.desc: Use: Devour Consume a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming a ward or Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.Range: 165Ward Range: 450

courier.desc: Use: Deploy Courier Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
courier.lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

tpscroll.desc: Use: TeleportAfter channeling for 3 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
tpscroll.notes: If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession, the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.

travel_boots.desc: Active: TeleportTeleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Teleporting to a unit is interrupted if the target unit dies.Shares a cooldown with Town Portal Scroll.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

travel_boots_2.desc: Active: Teleport Teleports you to any allied structure or unit, including heroes. Teleporting to a unit is interrupted if the target unit dies.Shares a cooldown with Town Portal Scroll.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

phase_boots.desc: Active: Phase Gives 24% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 20% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units for 2.5 seconds.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
phase_boots.lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

demon_edge.lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

eagle.lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

reaver.lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

relic.lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

hyperstone.lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

ring_of_health.lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

void_stone.lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

mystic_staff.lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

energy_booster.lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

point_booster.lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

vitality_booster.lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

power_treads.desc: Active: Switch AttributeSwitches between +10 Strength, +10 Agility, or +10 Intelligence.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
power_treads.notes:
Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi.
The attack speed bonus from multiple Power Treads does not stack.
power_treads.lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

hand_of_midas.desc: Active: Transmute Kills a non-hero target for 200 gold and 1.85x experience.  Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.Range: 600
hand_of_midas.notes:
The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).
Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.
hand_of_midas.lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

oblivion_staff.lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

pers.lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

poor_mans_shield.desc: Passive: Damage BlockWhen cooldown is ready, blocks 30 damage on melee heroes and 15 on ranged heroes. Only triggers on attacks from heroes. Gives a 50% chance to block 18 damage on melee heroes, and 9 damage on ranged.
poor_mans_shield.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
poor_mans_shield.lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

bracer.lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

wraith_band.lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

null_talisman.lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

mekansm.desc:
Active: RestoreHeals 250 health and gives +2 armor to allied units in a 900 radius.
Passive: Mekansm AuraGrants 3.5 health regeneration to allied units in a 900 radius.
mekansm.notes:
Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
mekansm.lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

vladmir.desc: Passive: Vladmir's AuraGrants lifesteal (15% for melee heroes, 10% for ranged), 2.5 health regeneration, 0.65 mana regeneration, 15% bonus attack damage, and 4 armor to nearby allies. Radius: 900
vladmir.notes:
Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
vladmir.lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

buckler.desc: Active: Armor Bonus Gives +2 armor to all allied units.  Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.Radius: 900
buckler.lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

ring_of_basilius.desc:
Passive: Basilius AuraGrants 0.5 mana regeneration and 2 armor in a 900 radius.
Toggle: AuraDeactivate aura to stop effecting non-hero units.
ring_of_basilius.notes:
Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.
ring_of_basilius.lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

pipe.desc:
Active: BarrierGives a shield that blocks 400 magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts 12 seconds.Radius: 900
Passive: Insight Aura Gives allied units 2 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance.Radius: 900
pipe.notes:
Multiple instances of Barrier do not stack.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance.
pipe.lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

urn_of_shadows.desc: Active: Soul Release Provides 35 health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals 25 damage per second when cast on enemies. Lasts 8 seconds.  Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units.  Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.Cast Range: 950
urn_of_shadows.notes:
Empty urns gain 2 charges.
If used on a hero with Soul Release already active on them, it will refresh its duration.
urn_of_shadows.lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

headdress.desc: Passive: Regeneration AuraGrants 2 health regeneration to allies.Radius: 900
headdress.notes: Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.
headdress.lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

sheepstick.desc: Active: HexTurns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.Instantly destroys illusions.Range: 800
sheepstick.notes: The target will have a base movement speed of 140, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
sheepstick.lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

orchid.desc: Active: Soul BurnSilences the target unit for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.Range: 900
orchid.lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

bloodthorn.desc:
Active: Soul Rend Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 30% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magic damage.Range: 900All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and 100% chance to crit for 140% more damage.
Passive: Critical Strike Grants a 20% chance for attacks to inflict 175% more damage.
bloodthorn.notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
bloodthorn.lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

echo_sabre.desc: Passive: Echo Strike Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 0.7 seconds on each strike.
echo_sabre.lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

cyclone.desc: Active: Cyclone Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.Range: 575Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
cyclone.notes:
You cannot cyclone allies.
Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.
Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
cyclone.lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

aether_lens.desc: Passive: Aethereal Focus Increases targeted spell and item cast range by 250.
aether_lens.lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

force_staff.desc: Active: ForcePushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.Range: 800
force_staff.notes:
Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
force_staff.lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

hurricane_pike.desc:
Active: Hurricane Thrust Pushes you and target enemy 450 units away from each other, and for 5 seconds, allows you to make 4 attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +100 attack speed.Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.Allied Range: 800Enemy Range: 400
Passive:  Dragon's Reach Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.
hurricane_pike.notes:
Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself.
Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
hurricane_pike.lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

dagon.desc: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: 600,650,700,750,800Mana Cost: 180
dagon.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

dagon_2.desc: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: 600,650,700,750,800Mana Cost: 180
dagon_2.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

dagon_3.desc: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: 600,650,700,750,800Mana Cost: 180
dagon_3.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

dagon_4.desc: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: 600,650,700,750,800Mana Cost: 180
dagon_4.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

dagon_5.desc: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: 600,650,700,750,800Mana Cost: 180
dagon_5.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

necronomicon.desc: Active: Demonic SummoningSummons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 50 seconds.Warrior:Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it.  Gains True Sight at level 3.Health: 700,800,900Damage: 75,100,125Mana Break Damage: 20,30,40Last Will Damage: 550,675,800Archer:Has a passive movement and attack speed aura.Health: 700,800,900Damage: 60,90,120Mana Burn Damage: 125,175,225Aura Move Speed: 5,7,9Aura Attack Speed: 5,10,15Aura Radius: 900
necronomicon.lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

necronomicon_2.desc: Active: Demonic SummoningSummons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 50 seconds.Warrior:Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it.  Gains True Sight at level 3.Health: 700,800,900Damage: 75,100,125Mana Break Damage: 20,30,40Last Will Damage: 550,675,800Archer:Has an activated mana burn ability, and a passive movement and attack speed aura.Health: 700,800,900Damage: 60,90,120Mana Burn Damage: 125,175,225Aura Move Speed: 5,7,9Aura Attack Speed: 5,10,15Aura Radius: 900
necronomicon_2.lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

necronomicon_3.desc: Active: Demonic SummoningSummons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 50 seconds.Warrior:Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it.  Gains True Sight at level 3.Health: 700,800,900Damage: 75,100,125Mana Break Damage: 20,30,40Last Will Damage: 550,675,800Archer:Has an activated mana burn ability, and a passive movement and attack speed aura.Health: 700,800,900Damage: 60,90,120Mana Burn Damage: 125,175,225Aura Move Speed: 5,7,9Aura Attack Speed: 5,10,15Aura Radius: 900
necronomicon_3.lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

ultimate_scepter.desc: Passive: Ultimate UpgradeUpgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of certain heroes.
ultimate_scepter.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

refresher.desc: Active: Reset CooldownsResets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
refresher.lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

assault.desc: Passive: Assault Aura Grants 25 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by -5.Radius: 900
assault.notes: Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
assault.lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

heart.desc: Passive: Health RegenerationRestores 7% of max health per second. If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes, or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.
heart.lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

black_king_bar.desc: Active: Avatar Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance.  Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Duration: 10,9,8,7,6,5 Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
black_king_bar.notes:
Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.
Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
black_king_bar.lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

aegis.desc: Passive: Reincarnation Brings you to life with full health and mana 5 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
aegis.lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

shivas_guard.desc:
Active: Arctic Blast Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4 seconds.Radius: 900
Passive: Freezing Aura Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by -45. Radius: 900
shivas_guard.notes:
The wave extends at a speed of 350 to a max size of 900.
The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
shivas_guard.lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

bloodstone.desc:
Active: Pocket DenyInstantly causes you to die.Must ground target to cast.  Cannot self cast.
Passive: BloodpactBegins with 14 charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1600 range. Each charge grants 0.4 mana regeneration per second, and reduces respawn time by 3 seconds. If the bearer dies, the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges.
bloodstone.notes: Only the first Bloodstone will gain charges.
bloodstone.lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

sphere.desc:
Passive: SpellblockBlocks most targeted spells once every 13 seconds.
Active: Transfer SpellblockTemporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for 13 seconds.Range: 700
sphere.lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

lotus_orb.desc: Active: Echo ShellApplies a shield to the target unit for 6 seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster.The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell. Range: 900Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
lotus_orb.lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

meteor_hammer.desc: Active: Meteor Hammer CHANNELED - After a succesful channel, summons a meteor that strikes a 300 AoE, stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemies units and buildings for 6 seconds.Building Impact Damage: 75 Building Over Time Damage: 60 Non-Building Impact Damage: 150 Non-Building Over Time Damage: 115 Channel Duration: 3 seconds.Landing Time: 0.5 seconds.

nullifier.desc: Active: Nullify Dispels the target and mutes them for 5 seconds. Anytime the muted target is attacked, it will be slowed by 100% for 0.4 seconds.

combo_breaker.desc:
Passive: Combo Breaker When you take damage and your health falls below 80%, a strong dispel is applied and you gain a 2.5 second buff that causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage. 

Passive: Status Resistance Reduces status effect durations by 25%.

refresher_shard.desc: Use: Reset CooldownsResets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

spirit_vessel.desc: Active: Soul Release When used against enemies, it reduces health by 3% of current health per second, and reduces HP regeneration and healing by 70%. Deals 20 damage per second. When used on allies, it increases health by 1% of current health per second, and increases HP regeneration and healing by 20%. Provides 35 health regeneration per second. Lasts 8 seconds.  Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units.  Only the closest Spirit Vessel to the dying hero will gain a charge.Cast Range: 950

vanguard.desc: Passive: Damage Block Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.
vanguard.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
vanguard.lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

crimson_guard.desc:
Active: Guard For 12 seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings +2 armor, and a 100% chance to block 60 damage from each incoming attack.Units may only be affected by Guard once every 46 seconds.Radius: 900
Passive: Damage Block Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.
crimson_guard.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
crimson_guard.lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

blade_mail.desc: Active: Damage ReturnFor 4.5 seconds, duplicates any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage.
blade_mail.notes:
Damage Return is calculated before any kind of reduction.
Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other forms of Blademail.
Returned damage type is the same as it was received.
Can pierce Spell Immunity if the original damage type does.
blade_mail.lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

hood_of_defiance.desc: Active: Barrier Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage.  Lasts 12 seconds.
hood_of_defiance.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
hood_of_defiance.lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

rapier.desc: Passive: Everlasting Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed. Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
rapier.notes: If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner, it cannot be dropped again except by death.
rapier.lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

monkey_king_bar.desc: Passive: PierceGrants each attack a 75% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 60 bonus pure damage.
monkey_king_bar.notes: True Strike does not work when attacking enemy structures.
monkey_king_bar.lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

radiance.desc: Toggle: Burn When active, scorches enemies for 60 damage per second, and causes them to miss 17% of their attacks.Radius: 700
radiance.lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

butterfly.desc: Active: Flutter Grants 35% additional movement speed for 2 seconds.
butterfly.notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
butterfly.lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

greater_crit.desc: Passive: Critical StrikeGrants each attack a 30% chance to deal 135% additional damage.
greater_crit.notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
greater_crit.lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

basher.desc: Passive: Bash Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 100 bonus damage.  Bash pierces evasion. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.
basher.notes:
Does not stack with other sources of Bash, however it will stack with Mini-Bash (e.g. Monkey King Bar).
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Troll Warlord.
basher.lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

bfury.desc:
Active: Chop Tree/Ward Destroy a target tree or ward.Tree Cast Range: 350Ward Cast Range: 450 
Passive: Quell Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 60% for melee heroes, and 25% for ranged. 
Passive: Cleave Deals 40% of attack damage in a cone up to 625 around the target. (Melee Only)
bfury.notes:
Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
If multiple sources of Cleave are present, each Cleave's damage is applied separately.
Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Remote Mines.
bfury.lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

manta.desc: Active: Mirror ImageCreates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage. Cooldown increased by 15 seconds on ranged heroes.Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
manta.notes:
Has a 0.1 second cast time during which you are invulnerable.
Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
Yasha based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

attrib.header: TOOLTIP DAMAGE INCOMING MELEE TOTAL PCT:
TOOLTIP DAMAGE INCOMING RANGED TOTAL PCT:

manta.lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

lesser_crit.desc: Passive: Critical StrikeGrants each attack a 20% chance to deal 75% additional damage.
lesser_crit.notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
lesser_crit.lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

dragon_lance.desc: Passive: Dragon's Reach Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.
dragon_lance.lore: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

armlet.desc: Toggle: Unholy StrengthWhen active, Unholy Strength grants +31 damage, +25 strength and +4 armor, but drains 54 health per second. You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
armlet.notes:
The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.
The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds.
Activating or deactiving Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling.

attrib.header: UNHOLY HEALTH DRAIN PER SECOND TOOLTIP:

armlet.lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

invis_sword.desc: Active: Shadow WalkMakes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units.  If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus damage on that attack.
invis_sword.notes:
Has a 0.3 second fade time.
If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.
invis_sword.lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

silver_edge.desc: Active: Shadow WalkMakes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While invisible, you move 25% faster and can move through units.  Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 175 bonus damage to the target, and for 5 seconds, disable their passive abilities.
silver_edge.notes:
Backstab cannot miss.
Backstab does not pierce spell immunity.
silver_edge.lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

sange_and_yasha.desc: Passive: Greater MaimEach attack has a 40% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by -26% and attack speed by -26 when used by a melee hero. Reduces enemy hero movement by -13% and attack speed by -13 when used by a ranged hero. Effect lasts 5 seconds.
sange_and_yasha.notes: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
sange_and_yasha.lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

satanic.desc:
Active: Unholy RageIncreases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 4.5 seconds. 
Passive: LifestealHeals the attacker for 25% of attack damage dealt.
satanic.lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

mjollnir.desc:
Active: Static ChargePlaces a charged shield on a target unit for 15 seconds which has a 20% chance to release a 200 damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.Range: 800
Passive: Chain LightningGrants a 25% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 12 targets within a 900 radius, dealing 150 magical damage to each.
mjollnir.notes:
Static Charge cannot trigger more than once per second.
Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than 900 range away.
Static Charge procs will not bounce to heroes that are invisible or hidden by Fog of War.
mjollnir.lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

skadi.desc: Passive: Cold Attack Attacks lower enemy attack speed by -45 and movement speed by -35%. Lasts 5 seconds when used by melee heroes, and 2.5 seconds when used by ranged.
skadi.notes: Lasts 5 seconds with melee Eye of Skadi, 2.5 seconds with ranged Eye of Skadi.
skadi.lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

sange.desc: Passive: Lesser MaimEach attack has a 30% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by -20% and attack speed by -20 when used by a melee hero. Reduces enemy hero movement by -10% and attack speed by -10 when used by a ranged hero. Effect lasts 5 seconds.
sange.lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

helm_of_the_dominator.desc:
Active: DominateTakes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 425 and max health to a minimum of 1500.Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1500 retain their original max health.  Dominated unit's bounty is set to %tooltip_bounty% gold.Range: 700
Passive: Dominator Aura Increases nearby allies' attack speed by 15 and health regen by 8.Radius: 900
helm_of_the_dominator.notes:
Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time.  If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.
Selling or upgrading Helm of the Dominator will cause dominated units to die.
helm_of_the_dominator.lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

maelstrom.desc: Passive: Chain LightningGrants a 25% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 900 radius, dealing 120 magical damage to each.
maelstrom.lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

desolator.desc: Passive: Corruption Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -6 for 15 seconds.
desolator.lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

yasha.notes: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
yasha.lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

mask_of_madness.desc:
Active: BerserkGives 110 attack speed and 17% movement speed, but reduces your armor by 7 and silences you.  Lasts 8 seconds.
Passive: LifestealHeals the attacker for 15% of attack damage dealt.
mask_of_madness.lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

diffusal_blade.desc:
Active: Purge Targets an enemy, slowing it for 4 seconds.Range: 600
Passive: ManabreakEach attack burns 50 mana from the target, and deals 0.8 physical damage per burned mana. Burns 16 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions.
diffusal_blade.notes: Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.
diffusal_blade.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

ethereal_blade.desc: Active: Ether BlastConverts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.  Lasts for 4 seconds on allies and 3 seconds on enemies.  Enemy targets are also slowed by -80%, and take 2x your primary attribute + 75 as magical damage.Range: 800
ethereal_blade.notes:
Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter.
Ethereal units take 40% bonus magic damage.
Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast.
Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.
ethereal_blade.lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

soul_ring.desc: Active: Sacrifice Consume 150 health to temporarily gain 150 mana.  Lasts 10 seconds.If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.
soul_ring.notes: If this mana is not used before the duration ends, the extra mana is lost.
soul_ring.lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

arcane_boots.desc: Active: Replenish ManaRestores 135 mana to all nearby allies.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.Radius: 900
arcane_boots.notes: Does not work on Meepo clones.
arcane_boots.lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

octarine_core.desc:
Passive: Cooldown ReductionReduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.
Passive: Spell Lifesteal25% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.  Lifesteal reduced to 5% against creeps.
octarine_core.lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

orb_of_venom.desc: Passive: Poison AttackPoisons the target, dealing 5 damage per second for 3 seconds and slowing movement -12% if the equipped hero is melee, or -4% if they are ranged.
orb_of_venom.lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

blight_stone.desc: Passive: Lesser Corruption Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -2 for 8 seconds.
blight_stone.lore: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

ancient_janggo.desc:
Active: Endurance Gives +35 attack speed and +13% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds. Radius: 900
Passive: Swiftness AuraGives 20 movement speed to nearby allies. Radius: 900
ancient_janggo.notes:
Re-purchasing the Drum of Endurance recipe will refresh its charges.
Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.
ancient_janggo.lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

medallion_of_courage.desc: Active: Valor If cast on an ally, grants them the 7 armor, and removing it from the caster. If cast on an enemy, reduces 7 armor on both the enemy and the caster. Cannot target magic immune enemies.Range: 1000
medallion_of_courage.lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

solar_crest.desc: Active: ShineWhen cast on an ally, grants them 10 armor and 20% evasion. When cast on an enemy, removes 10 of their armor and grants your allies 40% Accuracy on the target. Removes the armor and evasion from the caster when used.  Cannot target magic immune enemies.Range: 1000
solar_crest.lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

smoke_of_deceit.desc: Use: Disguise The user and all nearby allied player-controlled units in a 1025 radius gain Deceit and 15% bonus movement speed for 35 seconds. Attacking, or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility. Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.
smoke_of_deceit.lore: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

tome_of_knowledge.desc: Use: EnlightenGrants you 500 experience plus 135 per tome consumed by your team.Tomes Used By Team: %customval_team_tomes_used%
tome_of_knowledge.lore: That which raises beast to man and man to god.

veil_of_discord.desc: Active: Magic Weakness Cast a 600 radius blast that decreases enemy magic resistance by -25%.Range: 1000Duration: 16 seconds.

guardian_greaves.desc:
Active: MendRestores 250 health and 160 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.Radius: 900Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Passive: Guardian Aura Provides nearby allies with 3.5 health regeneration and 2 bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 12 health regeneration and 15 armor.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
guardian_greaves.notes: The aura boost only applies to heroes.
guardian_greaves.lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

rod_of_atos.desc: Active: CrippleRoots the target for 2 seconds.Range: 1150
rod_of_atos.lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

iron_talon.desc:
Active: ChopTargets a non-player enemy unit to remove 40% of its current HP.If cast on a tree or ward, instantly destroys it.Unit Range: 350Tree Range: 350Ward Range: 450
Passive: QuellIncreases attack damage against non-hero units by 24 for melee heroes, and 7 for ranged.
iron_talon.notes:
Has a 4 second cooldown on Trees.
Cannot target ancients.
iron_talon.lore: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.

abyssal_blade.desc:
Active: Overwhelm Stuns a target enemy unit for 2 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.
Passive: Bash Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 100 bonus damage.  Bash pierces evasion. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.
abyssal_blade.notes:
The stun is melee range.
Does not stack with other bashes.
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Troll Warlord.
abyssal_blade.lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

heavens_halberd.desc:
Active: DisarmPrevents a target from attacking for 3 seconds on melee targets, and 5 seconds on ranged targets.Range: 600 
Passive: Lesser MaimEach attack has a 35% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by -20% and attack speed by -20 if the user is melee. Reduces enemy hero movement by -10% and attack speed by -10 if the user is ranged. Effect lasts 5 seconds.
heavens_halberd.lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

ring_of_aquila.desc:
Passive: Aquila AuraGrants 0.5 mana regeneration and 2 armor to nearby allies.Radius: 900
Toggle: Aura Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.
ring_of_aquila.notes:
Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.
ring_of_aquila.lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

tranquil_boots.desc: Passive: Break Whenever you attack or are attacked, the bonus %bonus_health_health% HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 65 for 13 seconds.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
tranquil_boots.lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

shadow_amulet.desc: Active: FadeGrants invisibility to you or a target allied hero as long as target unit remains still.  Has a 1.25 second fade time, and breaks instantly upon moving. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.
shadow_amulet.lore: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

glimmer_cape.desc: Active: Glimmer After a 0.6 second delay, grants invisibility and 45% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for 5 seconds.Range: 800Can be cast while channelling.
glimmer_cape.lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

river_painter.desc: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into liquid chrome for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

river_painter2.desc: Pour this serum into the river to dry up the water for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect . Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

river_painter3.desc: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into a green slime for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

river_painter4.desc: Pour this serum into the river to make the water oily for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

river_painter5.desc: Pour this serum into the river to make the water electric for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

river_painter6.desc: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into a purple bubbling potion for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

river_painter7.desc: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into blood for 15 minutes. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.
